metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46814 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: A binary hijacking vulnerability exists within the VideoLAN VLC media player before 3.0.19 on Windows. The uninstaller attempts to execute code with elevated privileges out of a standard user writable location. Standard users may use this to gain arbitrary code execution as SYSTEM.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Only affects VLC on Windows, Ubuntu is not affected

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
